member.name: DWRITE_SHAPING_GLYPH_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Contains shaping output properties for an output glyph.

member.name: DWRITE_SHAPING_GLYPH_PROPERTIES.justification
member.summary: Indicates that the glyph has justification applied.

member.name: DWRITE_SHAPING_GLYPH_PROPERTIES.isClusterStart
member.summary: Indicates that the glyph is the start of a cluster.

member.name: DWRITE_SHAPING_GLYPH_PROPERTIES.isDiacritic
member.summary: Indicates that the glyph is a diacritic mark.

member.name: DWRITE_SHAPING_GLYPH_PROPERTIES.isZeroWidthSpace
member.summary: Indicates that the glyph is a word boundary with no visible space.
